Name: Chin Chin
Ingredients: Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Flute glass .
STIR honey with whisky in base of shaker until honey is dissolved.
Add apple juice and SHAKE with ice.
Review: Golden honey in colour and also in flavour. An unusual and great tasting 'champagne' cocktail.
History: Created in 2002 by Tony Conigliaro at Isola in Knightsbridge, London, England.
